text: Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck (born 21 February 1980) is the son of Jigme Singye Wangchuck and the 5th and current reigning Dragon King (Druk Gyalpo) of the Kingdom of Bhutan. He became king on 9 December 2006. He was officially crowned on 1 November 2008. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:People from Kathmandu Category:Monarchs of Bhutan
title: Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck
